message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know the value of this product is significant.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering the value of this product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still at $1,200,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay for this product.
